lead_paragraph: GRANITO--William R.,of Tenafly, NJ, died on May 8, 2016 at the age of 78. He was the devoted son of the late A.R. William Granito and Eufelia P. Granito. Survived by many loving cousins and friends, he is dearly missed. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GRANITO, WILLIAM R.
